DESCRIPTION: Displays info about purchasable items in game. Buy gems from Sofi to use in the bot. You can use Paypal for global purchases and Stripe if you from India.
VIEW_CAT: Use buttons to view other categories
DROP: Buy extra drops to drop a card without cooldown
GRAB: Buy extra grabs to grab a card without cooldown
TP: Used to access multitrade and games
GUILD_STONE: Buy guild stone to create your own guild
BG: Buy cool backgrounds to apply on your 3D cards
RECHARGE: Makes the unavailable glow available again
GEN_S: Buy scratcher to reveal your event card gen
STAT_RESET: This item can reset the upgraded stats
